svg.script: function go() { // Check that dynamic times are reset during a backwards seek var svg = document.documentElement; var a = document.getElementById('a'); svg.pauseAnimations(); svg.setCurrentTime(1); a.beginElement(); // First interval: 1s-2s a.endElementAt(1); a.beginElementAt(2); // Second interval: 3s-indef svg.setCurrentTime(5); a.endElementAt(1); // Add end time at 6s svg.setCurrentTime(4); // Perform backwards seek from 5s->4s svg.setCurrentTime(6); // End time at 6s should have been cleared // and we should still be active // (See SMIL 3.0, 'Hyperlinks and timing' which has: // Resolved end times associated with events, // Repeat-values, Accesskey-values or added via DOM // method calls are cleared when seeking to time // earlier than the resolved end time. svg.removeAttribute("class"); }
